name: Not So Middle Ages
description: Not So Middle Ages is a text quest where you play as a simple cubicle rat who has traveled back in time. Go back to the 14th century and try to survive in the dark Middle Ages!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 x64 Processor: 2GHz Dual-core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1Gb DirectX 9.0c compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 650 MB available space
